title: European beliefs and competition over colonies

content.question: In the late 1800s, attitudes such as the one expressed in the passage had contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: European states’ competition to acquire overseas colonies
The abolitionist movement to end slavery
The creation of industrialized economies in Europe
Efforts by European missionaries to convert non-Europeans to Christianity for their spiritual salvation

content.answer: European states’ competition to acquire overseas colonies

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
